Name: Bicycle Parts Store
Details: It it's a Bicycle Parts  Store parts manufacturer seller Website, Where a lot of Parts are Available fore wholesale sales.
bullet1: Used daisy UI as a component's library of Tailwind CSS.
bullet2: Firebase hook for Authentication. Also used React-Router, React Query, Nested Routes, Axios for make website more used friendly.
bullet3: Stripe payment Method jwt to verify security and two different roles admin client are implemented .Data are stored on MongoDB.

Name: Fasion ware House
Details: It's a Fasion Ware House -based website. Where a lot of clothes are stored.
bullet1: Frontend design with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite as component's library.
bullet2: Used React-Router to turn the application into Single Page Application.
bullet3: MongoDB for stored data and Express.js as Node.js framework. Backend data are hosting on Heroku.

Name: Personal Gym Trainer
Details: This is a Personal Trainer Center website and details of what services he provides
bullet1: •Used React-Router to turn the application into Single Page Application.
bullet2: Used Bootstrap as a CSS framework and Rechart for a graph view of services.
bullet3: •Used React Firebase hook for implement Email, Google, GitHub Login.
